title: Response Schema for the Customers Mutate operation of GoogleAds
description: Schema representing the output of the customers mutate operation in GoogleAds API

resourceName.description: The resource name of the customer that was mutated.
The resource name of the customer.

id.description: The unique identifier for the customer.

email.description: The email address of the customer.

videoBrandSafetySuitability.description: The video brand safety suitability of the customer.

currencyCode.description: The currency code of the customer.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the customer.

trackingUrlTemplate.description: The tracking URL template for the customer.

finalUrlSuffix.description: The final URL suffix for the customer.

autoTaggingEnabled.description: Indicates whether auto-tagging is enabled for the customer.

hasPartnersBadge.description: Indicates whether the customer has a partners badge.

testAccount.description: Indicates whether the customer is a test account.

optimizationScore.description: The optimization score of the customer.

locationAssetAutoMigrationDone.description: Indicates whether location asset auto-migration is done for the customer.

imageAssetAutoMigrationDone.description: Indicates whether image asset auto-migration is done for the customer.

locationAssetAutoMigrationDoneDateTime.description: The date and time when location asset auto-migration was done for the customer.

imageAssetAutoMigrationDoneDateTime.description: The date and time when image asset auto-migration was done for the customer.

localServicesSettings.description: Settings related to local services for the customer.

customerAgreement.description: The customer agreement associated with the customer.

callReportingSetting.description: Settings related to call reporting for the customer.

optimizationScoreWeight.description: The weight of the optimization score for the customer.

payPerConversionEligibilityFailureReason.description: Reasons for the failure of pay-per-conversion eligibility.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
